blogPost.excerpt: Waldo is the world’s first no-code testing platform that lets anyone create reliable, automated mobile tests without the hassle of scripting. Forget scripting your mobile tests, use waldo. Now available for Android!
blogPost.body: Waldo is the world’s first no-code testing platform that lets anyone create reliable, automated mobile tests without the hassle of scripting. Forget scripting your mobile tests, use waldo. Now available for Android!
blogPost.title: Waldo for Android - No-code mobile testing that works
blogPost.author: Amine Bellakrid

localize.description: Waldo是世界上第一个无代码测试平台，让任何人都可以创建可靠的、自动化的移动测试，而无需编写脚本的麻烦。忘记您的移动测试脚本，使用Waldo。现在可以在Android上使用
